headline: Fight the Urge to Sell: 3 Stocks With Terrible Charts That Still Look Like Buying Opportunities If You’re Patient Enough
summary: I recently saw a social media post which stood out to me. This post was a long-term chart going back about 50 years, highlighting all the downturns over this time frame, and all the reasons investors had to sell at particular down points in the market. There were so many near-term downturns (which now look ... Fight the Urge to Sell: 3 Stocks With Terrible Charts That Still Look Like Buying Opportunities If You’re Patient Enough

headline: Lululemon founder Chip Wilson scuffles with board amid CEO search
summary: The brand says it wants to avoid a proxy fight but that Wilson “declined to engage further” after nominating three people to its board.

raw.headline: Lululemon founder Chip Wilson scuffles with board amid CEO search
raw.summary: The brand says it wants to avoid a proxy fight but that Wilson “declined to engage further” after nominating three people to its board.

headline: Lululemon, Tesla, Delta, Nike and More Stocks That Defined Last Week
summary: Why did precious metals lose their sheen? And how much did holiday snowstorms hit airline stocks? Plus, how is BYD shaking up the electric-vehicle race? Reporter Francesca Fontana discusses the biggest asset moves of last week and the news that drove them.

raw.headline: Lululemon, Tesla, Delta, Nike and More Stocks That Defined Last Week
raw.summary: Why did precious metals lose their sheen? And how much did holiday snowstorms hit airline stocks? Plus, how is BYD shaking up the electric-vehicle race? Reporter Francesca Fontana discusses the biggest asset moves of last week and the news that drove them.

headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Research Further and 1 We Ignore
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.

raw.headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Research Further and 1 We Ignore
